
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/yeyunfei/p/18916809" title="发布于 2025-06-07 23:42">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">如何基于three.js(webgl)引擎架构，实现3D密集架库房,3D档案室智能巡检</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        3d建筑,3d库房,3d档案室,3d密集架,webGL,threejs,3d机房,bim管理系统、3D密集架库房,3d机器人取档、3d机器人盘点、3d人工查档、3d设备巡检
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18pt">　&nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>前言：</strong></span></p>
<p>　　看了一下 距离上篇课程发布，一年多了。这一年多来也迷茫，也怀疑，在AI时代，是不是失去了写文章的意义了。切身感受到那种面对科技浪潮时的迷茫和无力感。当AI能写出流畅、结构清晰的文章，甚至模仿不同风格时，着实令人沉思。</p>
<p>　　继续更新，是否即将失去意义？这种困惑很真实，但也值得重新审视写文章的本质。经过这段时间的思考挖掘，突然明白了，“写文章”的意义远恐怕不止于此，AI 难以真正替代的核心价值在于，独一无二的“人”的视角与洞见；‌个体经验与情感；批判性思维与立场。</p>
<p>　　情感共鸣与连接，‌自我探索与‌表达欲都是继续更新的意义与动力吧。</p>
<p>　　我们还是闲话少叙，切入正题。书<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/yeyunfei/p/18023685" target="_blank">接上回，我们聊到智能档案库房的机器人巡检，盘点等</a>。这里我们继续讲解巡检路径规划等内容。</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18pt"><strong>　序：</strong></span></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　当档案库房突破二维平面，在虚拟空间中拔地而起时，传统的巡检方式正面临前所未有的挑战。蜿蜒的立体货架、交错的消防通道、分层的温控区域，构成了一个需要重新定义巡检规则的数字迷宫。</p>
<p>　　接下来将以"空间认知-路径建模-动态优化"为逻辑主线。通过三维建模技术，构建数字孪生库房的基础坐标系；继而引入蚁群算法、遗传算法等智能路径规划工具，解决多目标约束下的最优路径求解问题；实现从理论到实践的闭环验证。</p>
<p>　　下面我们探讨并如何利用三维编辑技术，规划人工巡检路径规划的运作流程。</p>
<p>　　<span style="font-size: 18pt">一、建模</span></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　1.1、效果展示</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　　　1.1.1、园区楼宇展示</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232141544-6982071.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;楼宇园区建模，主旨就是好看，炫酷。</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　　　1.1.2、楼层展示</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232156743-813351367.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;楼层采用爆炸方式展开，方便用户选择楼层</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　　　1.1.3、档案室展示</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232214925-1525915364.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;可选择楼层双击进入楼层库房</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232234656-100495583.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　　　1.1.4、档案查看展示</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232245458-1581698667.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18pt">　二、添加管理设备</span></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>　　　　2.1、添加管理效果展示</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232324041-2026588381.gif" alt="" width="917" height="539" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>2.2、实现说明</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　　支持编辑场景模型，支持拖拽、旋转、删除等功能。系统内置不同设备类型模型，用户可以自定义添加场景中设备模型的数量，以及绑定数据关系。便于后期巡检期间检查该设备状态以及数据等。</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">function () {
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> devparams =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> JSON.stringify(getDevSaveDatas());
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> systemName = $(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#systemName</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).val();
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> roomName = $(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#roomName</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).val();
            webapi.setSystemConfig(devparams, systemName, roomName, function (response) {
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (response &amp;&amp; response.msg &amp;&amp; response.msg ==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">操作成功</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
                    $(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#roomTitle</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).html(roomName);
                    $(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">#systemTitle</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).html(systemName);
                }
            }, function (err) {
            });
            msj3DObj.viewState </span>= <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
            modelbusiness.editState </span>= <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">show</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
            msj3DObj.transformControl.enabled </span>= <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
            msj3DObj.transformControl.visible </span>= <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
            layer.closeAll();
        },</span></pre>
</div>
<div class="cnblogs_Highlighter">
<pre class="brush:javascript;gutter:true;"> $("#manageBtn").click(function () {
     layer.closeAll();
     manageBoxType();
 });
 $("#moveBtn").click(function () {
     if (msj3DObj.transformControl &amp;&amp; msj3DObj.transformControl.object.name.indexOf("dev_") &gt;= 0) {


         msj3DObj.transformControl.setMode("translate");

     } else {
         layer.msg("请选择具体设备！");
     }
 });
 $("#raotationBtn").click(function () {
     if (msj3DObj.transformControl &amp;&amp; msj3DObj.transformControl.object.name.indexOf("dev_") &gt;= 0) {
         msj3DObj.transformControl.setMode("rotate");
     } else {
         layer.msg("请选择具体设备！");
     }
 });
 $("#deleteBtn").click(function () {
     if (msj3DObj.transformControl &amp;&amp; msj3DObj.transformControl.object.name.indexOf("dev_") &gt;= 0) {
         msj3DObj.destoryObj(msj3DObj.transformControl.object.name);
     } else {
         layer.msg("请选择具体设备！");
     }
 });
</pre>
</div>
<p>　　</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　　　</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18pt">　三、路径编辑</span></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>3.1、巡检路径编辑效果展示</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>3.1.1、巡检路径规划</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232352971-1143882786.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>&nbsp;3.1.2、巡检路径编辑</strong></p>
<p>巡检路径编辑，可以修改原来的路径，以及绑定节点的巡检设备。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232456771-32231072.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>3.2、实现说明</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　技术难点在于如何支持添加编辑路径，模型内绘制线路跟随鼠标运动。</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　实现代码如下：</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　　　</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">function</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (_obj, objs) {
    console.log(_obj);
    console.log(objs);
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">计算出需要移动的线</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (objs &amp;&amp; objs.length &gt; 0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> selectname = objs[0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].object.name;
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (selectname.indexOf("PathLine_") &gt;= 0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> lineindex = parseInt(selectname.split("OBJCREN")[0].replace("PathLine_", ""<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">));
            modelbusiness.movePathIndex </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> lineindex;
            </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (selectname.indexOf("OBJCREN1") &gt;= 0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (lineindex == 0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
                  
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> startPoint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position;
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> endPiint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position
                    modelbusiness.addMoveLengthLine(</span>"tempLine", startPoint, endPiint, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);

                } </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">删除前一条线</span>
                    msj3DObj.destoryObj("PathLine_" + (lineindex-1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">));
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">删除当前线</span>
                    msj3DObj.destoryObj("PathLine_" +<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (lineindex));

                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> startPoint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[lineindex - 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position;
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> endPiint =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> modelbusiness.pathLineData[lineindex].position
                    modelbusiness.addMoveLengthLine(</span>"tempLine", startPoint, endPiint, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);


                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> startPoint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[lineindex+1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position;
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> endPiint =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> modelbusiness.pathLineData[lineindex].position
                    modelbusiness.addMoveLengthLine(</span>"tempLine_2", startPoint, endPiint, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
                }

            } </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (selectname.indexOf("OBJCREN2") &gt;= 0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
                msj3DObj.destoryObj(</span>"PathLine_" +<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (lineindex));
                modelbusiness.movePathIndex </span>= lineindex+1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
              
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> startPoint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[modelbusiness.pathLineData.length-2<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position;
                </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> endPiint = modelbusiness.pathLineData[modelbusiness.pathLineData.length - 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">].position
                modelbusiness.addMoveLengthLine(</span>"tempLine", startPoint, endPiint, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
            }

        } 
    }
} </span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18pt">　四、巡检执行</span></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>4.1、执行效果</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">安装规划的路径，可选择第一人称，第三人称效果去巡查节点上的设备状态以及数据。</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>4.1.1、第三人称巡检</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232434576-497703943.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>4.1.2、第一人称巡检</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232558293-544951953.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>4.1.3、日巡检计划管理</strong></p>
<p>规划每天的巡检计划，到点时，自动安装规划的巡检路径巡检。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/800616/202506/800616-20250607232621985-766909541.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>4.2、实现说明</strong></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　巡检执行，跟上篇文章的实现方式类似，人物安装指定路径行走，到绑定的设备节点时，停下检查设备数据与状态即可</p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">　　部分代码如下：</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>odelBusiness.prototype.peopleWalkVRate = 40;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">人物行走速度</span>
ModelBusiness.prototype.doRouteType = 1;<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">3第三   1 第一</span>
ModelBusiness.prototype.routeData = [];<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">3第三   1 第一</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">
//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">第三人称巡检</span>
ModelBusiness.prototype.doThirdPersonRoute = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">function</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> () {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.runState == 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
        layer.msg(</span>"正在执行巡检，请先结束巡检"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    }
    $(</span>"#routeDataList").html(""); $("#routeDataList"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).show();
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.showPeople();
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.runState = 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.doRouteType = 3<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.routeData =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> [];
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.doRouteRunStep(0, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.pathLineData);
}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">第一人称巡检</span>
ModelBusiness.prototype.doFirstPersonRoute = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">function</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> () {
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.runState == 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
        layer.msg(</span>"正在执行巡检，请先结束巡检"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    }
    $(</span>"#routeDataList").html(""); $("#routeDataList"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).show();
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.showPeople();
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.doRouteType = 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.routeData =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> [];
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.runState = 1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.doRouteRunStep(0, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.pathLineData,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">停止巡检</span>
ModelBusiness.prototype.stopRoute = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">function</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> () {

    $(</span>"#routeDataList"<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">).hide();
    $(</span>"#routeDataList").html(""<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);

    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">this</span>.runState = 0
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (modelbusiness.currentSetTimeOut) {
        clearTimeout(modelbusiness.currentSetTimeOut)
    }
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (modelbusiness.people&amp;&amp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">modelbusiness.people._tween) {
        modelbusiness.people._tween.stop();
        modelbusiness.people.visible </span>= <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
        modelbusiness.people.position.y </span>= 1000000<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

        modelbusiness.people.mixer.clipAction(modelbusiness.people.oldGLTFObj.animations[</span>1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]).stop();
        modelbusiness.people.mixer.clipAction(modelbusiness.people.oldGLTFObj.animations[</span>0<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">]).play();
    }
    msj3DObj.commonFunc.changeCameraPosition(modelbusiness.defaultState.camera, modelbusiness.defaultState.target
        , </span>100, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">function</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> () {
        });
}</span></pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>如果你有什么要交流的心得 可邮件我 1203193731@qq.com</p>
